question: [File: volo-vault/sources/vault_receipt_info.move] [Function: update_after_request_deposit()] [Deposit Cap Bypass] Does pending_deposit_balance have maximum limit, and if not, can whale user request deposit of entire vault capacity blocking all other users from depositing? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/vault_receipt_info.move] [Function: update_after_request_withdraw()] [Withdraw Rush Attack] Can multiple users simultaneously request withdrawals exceeding vault's liquid assets, and does pending_withdraw_shares tracking prevent bank run scenario where early withdrawers drain vault leaving late withdrawers with worthless shares? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/vault_receipt_info.move] [Function: update_after_execute_deposit()] [Last Deposit Time Gaming] Can attacker make tiny deposits repeatedly to continuously update last_deposit_time, extending withdrawal lock period indefinitely and trapping other users' funds? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/vault_receipt_info.move] [Function: update_after_execute_withdraw()] [Partial Execution Strategy] If vault partially executes withdrawals (executed_withdraw_shares < pending_withdraw_shares), can user game this by requesting withdrawal and hoping for favorable partial execution timing when vault assets appreciate? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/vault_receipt_info.move] [Struct: VaultReceiptInfo] [Receipt Per User Assumption] Does each user have exactly one VaultReceiptInfo, or can user have multiple receipts, and if multiple, can they exploit race conditions between receipts to inflate shares or rewards? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/vault_receipt_info.move] [Function: update_after_execute_deposit()] [Execute Full Pending Balance] When executed_deposit_balance == pending_deposit_balance (full execution), is pending_deposit_balance guaranteed to become exactly 0, or can floating point/rounding cause tiny residual amounts that accumulate over time? (Low)
